message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.LG

This paper deals with natural language processing and information retrieval, specifically in the context of social media and news articles. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves cross-lingual analysis, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) or cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). Additionally, the paper involves machine learning techniques, which could place it in cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.SD (Software Engineering).
